content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Collection System at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-16.5, -51.5) connected to the mining drill
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5) receiving items from the inserter
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) transferring items from the chest
- Wooden Chest at position (-13.5, -51.5) collecting items from the second inserter

### Iron Plate Production System at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (63.5, -52.5) intended to feed the furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to obstructions
- Ensure that the intended location for placing an entity is clear of obstructions before attempting placement. Repeated failures to place a burner inserter at (61.0, -53.0) indicate that the area is obstructed.

### Errors due to missing items in inventory
- Before attempting to place an entity, verify that the required item is present in the inventory. The error when trying to place a wooden chest without having one in inventory highlights this issue.

### Errors related to inserters waiting for source items
- Ensure that the source items are available for inserters to function properly. Inserters waiting for source items indicate a potential bottleneck or misconfiguration in the supply chain.
